items.title: COVID-19 Testing Update - Actualización de pruebas de detección de COVID-19
items.summary: As of Monday, October 12, 2020, Napa County has COVID-19 testing capacity and availability within the next week. Test results are coming back within 2-5 days andit is important for Napa County to maintain high testing numbers in order to avoid business r...

items.title: Napa County Offers Tips for a Safe Halloween
items.summary:

items.title: COVID-19 Guidance for Fire Evacuees
items.summary: COVID-19 Guidance for Fire Evacuees Individuals who are seeking shelter are reminded to bring a face covering, practice good hygiene habits, such as handwashing, and adhere to social distancing protocols.If you have been evacuated due to the fire...

items.title: Local Assistance Center Update
